column4: ISPs have been known to use "transparent" proxies. What are the symptoms you are complaining about?
i know it isnt my isp.. chrome works, wine-firefox works, it's speciffically ubuntu ff thats borked.. it's saying the proxy is refusing connections when i have n damn proxy
i even SET a proxy with adb with my droid (ADB teathering by proxy) and ff complains, when chrome and others just work
on my computer Edit> preferences>(Advanced)>(Network)>Settings (button)>is set to "Use system proxy settings"
